title: Adam Schiff
description:
In this episode Ellen sits down with Democratic Representative Adam Schiff. They discuss staying optimistic in our polarized political climate, navigating power grabs, and his new book Midnight in Washington: How We Almost Lost Our Democracy and Still Could.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
